trans-unit.source: Handles <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> subelements that do not have specific implementations or handlers registered on the machine.

The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> subelements with specific implementations are <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoName>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoX509Data>.

For more information about the `<KeyInfo>` element, see Section 4.4 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/, or see the XML Encryption specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref> class with content taken from the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref>.
An XML element from which to take the content used to create the new instance of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref>.
Returns an XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> returned by this method is suitable for use as a subelement of an XMLDSIG or an XML encryption `<KeyInfo>` element.
Parses the input <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> and configures the internal state of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref> to match.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that specifies the state of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref>.
Gets or sets the XML content of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref>.
The XML content of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref>.
